metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18398 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Xfce Thunar 1.6.15, when Xfce 4.12 is used, mishandles the IBus-Unikeyinput method for file searches within File Manager, leading to anout-of-bounds read and SEGV. This could potentially be exploited by anarbitrary local user who creates files in /tmp before the victim uses thisinput method.

criterions.comment: thunar: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
